data.title: Make your kitchen the heart of your home
Inspire your kitchen creativity with NEFF
data.description: Eat, meet and get creative in your kitchen with NEFF's stunning collection of appliances. From iconic Slide&Hide® ovens to stylish dishwashers, fridges and washing machines, you'll be perfecting even the trickiest of dishes - all whilst making housework a breeze.

data.title: Slide, hide, cook, create
data.description: Navigate your kitchen like a pro. With NEFF's iconic Slide&Hide® oven, it's as easy as flipping the unique sliding door open with one hand, whilst you tend to your showstopping dishes in the other. Once the door has slid neatly underneath, you've got plenty of room to fill up your oven with your culinary creations. So if you're a dab hand when it comes to hosting dinner parties, NEFF have got you covered.

data.title: This oven has never failed to amaze me so far
data.description: "Top quality and makes cooking the family meals every day so much better. I have even made different types of breads and the proving function is amazing."

data.title: Less cleaning, more cooking
data.description: The most creative cooks make the most mess. But when it comes to scrubbing your NEFF oven after you’ve been experimenting, you can forget about the elbow grease. Thanks to Pyrolytic self-cleaning, which burns away dirt and grime at super high temperatures, your splashes and spills will be reduced to a small pile of ashes. So with a quick wipe of your dishcloth, the job’s done!

slides.title: Beautifully built-in, seamlessly stylish
slides.description: Discover a collection of stunning built-in appliances from NEFF. Made to fit seamlessly into your kitchen, these washing machines, dishwashers and fridge freezers will look great, with plenty of tech to make kitchen life that little bit more laid back.

slides.title: Cleaner, more hygienic dishes
slides.description: The thought of washing up is enough to put anyone off their dessert. Luckily, with a NEFF built-in dishwasher you can get cleaned up without lifting a finger. Thanks to the intensive Chef 70 programme, you won’t miss scrubbing off those stubborn stains and baked on bits of food. It works by combining high pressure water jets and 70°C temperatures, keeping your dishes hygienic and super spotless.

slides.title: Fresher, tastier food
slides.description: Your culinary creations deserve so much more than wilting salad and stale veggies. Thanks to FreshSafe technology in NEFF’s range of fridges and freezers, your fresh produce will be in fine form and extra tasty for up to twice as long. It works by storing all your fruit, veg, meat and cheese at slightly lower temperatures - so when you’re cooking up a storm, your ingredients will always be at their best.

slides.title: Extraordinarily quiet, super- efficient
slides.description: You’ll always know where your laundry’s at with a NEFF washing machine. Thanks to clever Timelight technology, the remaining wash time is projected onto your floor - so you can forget the guesswork and get on with planning your day. And because these machines feature a whisper-quiet EcoSilence Drive motor, you can pop a load on, sit back and put your feet up.

data.title: Get closer to your cooking with Slide&Hide®
